mapper.select: select * from inquiry where inq_email = #{user_email} order by inq_date desc
select count(*) from inquiry where inq_email = #{user_email}
select * from review where review_email = #{user_email} order by review_date desc
select count(*) from review where review_email = #{user_email}

SELECT o.order_seq, o.order_date, d.prod_title, p.pay_total_money as total_cost FROM pay as p, order_list as o , delivery as d WHERE o.order_seq = p.order_seq AND o.order_seq = d.order_seq AND o.user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT p.prod_title_image, p.prod_title, p.prod_price_sale, o.order_seq, o.order_prod_seq, o.prod_amount, p.prod_point, d.delivery_state, d.delivery_seq FROM product as p, order_prod as o, delivery as d WHERE p.prod_code = o.prod_code and o.order_seq = d.order_seq and o.user_id = #{user_id}
SELECT o.order_date, o.order_seq, u.user_name FROM order_list AS o, user_member AS u WHERE u.user_id = o.user_id AND o.order_seq = #{order_seq} AND o.user_id = #{user_id}
SELECT * FROM delivery WHERE order_seq = #{order_seq} AND user_id = #{user_id}

select * from (select inq_seq, inq_title, inq_date, inq_email, '문의사항' as table_name from inquiry union select review_seq, review_title, review_date, review_email, '후기' as table_name from review) as u where u.inq_email=#{user_email} order by u.inq_date desc limit 5;
